page.title: Penn State Nittany Lions football under Joe Paterno (in the Big Ten)

revisions.rev:
'''[[Joe Paterno]]''' is a former head coach of [[Penn State Nittany Lions football]]. Paterno served as head coach from the retirement of [[Rip Engle]] after the 1965 season until he was fired on November 9, 2011, in the wake of the [[Penn State sex abuse scandal]].{{cite news|url=http://www.cbsnews.com/8301-400_162-57321984/paterno-fired-over-penn-st-child-abuse-scandal/|title=Paterno fired over Penn St. child abuse scandal|publisher=[[CBS News]]|date=November 9, 2011}} His teams played their home games at [[Beaver Stadium]] in [[University Park, Pennsylvania|University Park, PA]]. Penn State started playing in the [[Big Ten Conference]] in 1993. ==Record against [[Big Ten Conference|Big 10]] Opponents (1993â2010 Conference Games Only).
